name: Lockdown Simulator: Need to Pet Doggos Edition
name_original: Lockdown Simulator: Need to Pet Doggos Edition
description:
Stay inside for lock-down or go out and try to find doggos to pet.

This game was made for a friend during a Media Secret Santa: much like a traditional Secret Santa, but all the gifts had to be pieces of digital media.

Credits:

Study And Relax by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5764-study-and-relax
